job_title: Community Development Coordinator in Petawawa, ON
pros: Every day I have multiple opportunities to make a positive difference for animals and people in need in our Community. Connecting animals and people and keeping animals with their people means a lot to me and I feel very fortunate to be in the role I am today.
cons: Every animal touches you in some way, it's hard not to take them all home! Knowing you've done what you can to help them live the great life they deserve is truly the most powerful and rewarding experience!
